Chinese Friendship Delegation Sojourns in Korea 
   Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Chinese friendship delegation led by Hui Liangyu, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of China and vice-premier of the State Council of China, on a visit to the DPRK to participate in the celebrations of the 45th anniversary of the conclusion of the Korea-China Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance visited the Tower of the Juche Idea and laid a wreath before the Tower of Friendship on July 10.
 The delegation also visited the International Friendship Exhibition, the e-library of Kim Chaek University of Technology and the West Sea Barrage on July 12.

Floral Basket Sent to DPRK Embassy in Conakry 
   Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- The Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea sent a floral basket to the DPRK embassy in Conakry on July 8 on the occasion of the 12th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
 Written on the ribbon of the floral basket were letters "We pay homage to H.E. Kim Il Sung. The National Political Bureau of the Party for Unity and Progress of Guinea."

articles.content:
DPRK Hit by Heavy Rain
   Pyongyang, July 13 (KCNA) -- Some areas of the DPRK were hit by a torrential rain under the influence of the typhoon No. 3 passing through Korea.
 According to Kim Won Chun, vice-director of the Central Meteorological Institute under the Hydrometeorological Service, there was a lot of rain across the country between 09 on July 10 and 06 on July 11. The precipitation in the Kosong area of Kangwon Province was 198 millimeters. In particular it witnessed 133 millimeters of rainfall between 18 and 21 on the 10th.    
 From the dawn of July 12 it started to rain again after a short suspension and gradually turned into downpour in the eastern and western coastal areas. For three hours from 06 that day, it rained 51, 42, 50 and 52 millimeters respectively in Pyongyang, Kumchon and Thosan of North Hwanghae Province and Maengsan of South Phyongan Province.
